titleStmt.title: Sacred poems, or, Briefe meditations, of the day in generall and of all the dayes in the weeke
titleStmt.author: Browne, Edward.

titleStmt.title: Sacred poems, or, Briefe meditations, of the day in generall and of all the dayes in the weeke
titleStmt.author: Browne, Edward.
Du Bartas, Guillaume de Salluste, seigneur, 1544-1590. Sepmaine. English.
Sylvester, Josuah, 1563-1618.

notesStmt.note: More than half of the selections are taken from Josuah Sylvester's translation of Du Bartas's Divine weeks.

The first part, in prose, "A description of an annuall world, or, Briefe meditations upon all the holy-daies in the yeere. London : Printed by E.G., 1641," is wanting in this copy. Cf. Fry, J. Bibl. memoranda, p. 217-223; Corser, v. 2, pt. 1, p. 133-144.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
(Actually keyed from identical image set VID 65162.)

person.persName: Du Bartas, Guillaume de Salluste, seigneur,
